manifest.author: iamzainnnn
manifest.changelog:
*Enabled prism font.
*Enabled search tab audio previews.
*You can now record video with the volume keys.
*Now you will be able to see the camera icon in the feed gallery.
*Updated suggested reels design on feed.
*Updated hype interactions.
*Enhanced carousel peek elements.
*Updated some designs.
*Redesigned comments author badge
*Brought back stories cube animation.
*Brought back reels fast playback.
*Brought back timed polls in reels post.
*Redesigned some elements.
*Some minor changes.
*Fixed some issues and glitches.
manifest.name: Zain's Backup
manifest.description: This backup maked for the newest features!
